revised_title: Researches on the Foraminifera: Fourth and Concluding Series
tldr: The author examines various types of Foraminifera, a group of marine organisms, and their diverse structures. They discuss the role of the canal system in their growth and development, as well as the relationship between Foraminifera and other organisms like Sponges. The author concludes that understanding the evolution and modification of these organisms is crucial for a natural classification system.
